## minimaIndices variable

Returns an iterator yielding all minima indices in given `values` array. The search range can be optionally defined via semi-open \[from, to) index interval.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
minimaIndices: (values: number[], from?: number, to?: number) => Generator<number, void, unknown>
```
